message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind item that I think you'll really love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $9500. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but my budget is limited. Would you consider selling it for $8500?
Hi Bob, thank you for your offer. I appreciate your honesty about your budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can sell the product to you for $9000. What do you think?
